Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 5.7.0, all versions starting from 6.5.0 before 6.34.0, all versions starting from 7.0.0-preview before 7.1.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 5.7.0 before 6.5.0, all versions starting from 6.34.0 before 7.0.0-preview, all versions starting from 7.1.2
